# CampaignInfo

This table shows information about campaigns identified by Microsoft Defender for Office 365.


## Table attributes

|Attribute|Value|
|---|---|
|**Resource types**|-|
|**Categories**|Security|
|**Solutions**| SecurityInsights|
|**Basic log**|Yes|
|**Ingestion-time transformation**|No|
|**Sample Queries**|-|
